Record.ParentTerm: Adverse Event Associated with Pulmonary and Upper Respiratory Systems
Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Cause/Adverse Event/Adverse Event by CTCAE Category/Adverse Event Associated with Pulmonary and Upper Respiratory Systems/Pneumothorax Adverse Event

Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Pleural Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Pleural Disorder/Pneumothorax
Record.BroaderTerm: Adverse Event Associated with Pulmonary and Upper Respiratory Systems
Record.Description: An accumulation of air or gas in the pleural space, which may occur spontaneously or as a result of trauma or a pathological process, or be introduced deliberately ( = PNEUMOTHORAX, ARTIFICIAL). (Dorland, 27th ed)
Pneumothorax; abnormal presence of air in the pleural cavity resulting in the collapse of the lung.
